title: 09: Unpacking Pokemon Go
description: With the success of Pokémon Go, the enormity of the mobile market has been made shockingly clear. Confluence of technologies? Nostalgia and brand power? Thirst for distraction? Gartenberg, Caldwell, and Caldwell discuss what lessons can be learned and what'll come next.
itunes:author: Michael Gartenberg, Serenity Caldwell, Rene Ritchie
itunes:subtitle: With the success of Pokémon Go, the enormity of the mobile market has been made shockingly clear. Confluence of technologies? Nostalgia and brand power? Thirst for distraction? What lessons can be learned and what'll come next.
